name: Lab Report Up Normal
query:
SELECT
    L.date AS "Date",
    L.template AS "Template:Data:250",

    CASE
        WHEN (Lt.lab_test_event IS NULL OR Lt.lab_test_event = '') OR (Lt.result_value IS NULL OR Lt.result_value = '')
            THEN Lt.lab_test_name
        ELSE NULL
    END AS "Test Name:Data:150",

    CASE
        WHEN (Lt.lab_test_event IS NOT NULL AND Lt.lab_test_event != '')
            THEN Lt.lab_test_event
        ELSE NULL
    END AS "Event Name:Data:150",

    Lt.result_value AS "Result:Data:100",
    L.patient AS "PID",
    L.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:250",
    L.patient_sex AS "Gender:Data:150",
    L.practitioner AS "Practitioner:Data:250",
    L.requesting_department AS "Requesting Department:Data:250",
    L.patient_age AS "Age:Data:50",
    1 AS "Flag:Data:50"

FROM
    `tabLab Result` L
JOIN
    `tabNormal Test Result` Lt ON Lt.parent = L.name

WHERE
    L.date BETWEEN %(From)s AND %(To)s
    AND L.docstatus = 1
    AND (
        (Lt.lab_test_name IS NOT NULL AND Lt.lab_test_name != '' AND Lt.lab_test_event IS NULL AND Lt.result_value IS NOT NULL AND Lt.result_value != '')
        OR (Lt.lab_test_name IS NOT NULL AND Lt.lab_test_name != '' AND (Lt.result_value IS NULL OR Lt.result_value = ''))
        OR (Lt.lab_test_event IS NOT NULL AND Lt.lab_test_event != '' AND Lt.result_value IS NOT NULL AND Lt.result_value != '')
    )

ORDER BY
    L.patient_name,
    L.date,
    L.template,
    Lt.lab_test_name,
    Lt.idx;
